main event: An observer reported seeing a large black 'wing-like' object flying slowly in circles over Bethel, Connecticut on March 10, 1950, which was initially thought to be a UFO.
interesting points: The object circled the center of Bethel four times,On the fourth pass, a brilliant white light appeared at the bottom of the 'wing-like' object,The object disappeared in a northeasterly direction after being visible for three minutes,It was observed at an altitude of approximately 8,000 feet,The object was initially seen alongside three single-engine Navy bi-wing planes flying in formation.
witness description: An observer who described seeing the object alongside Navy planes.
